lead_paragraph: Three firms stopped training in commercial property funds, to protect investors after Britain voted to leave the European Union.

headline.print_headline: Four-Day Rally Skids to a Stop
headline.main: A Four-Day Rally on Wall St. Skids to a Stop

snippet: Three firms stopped training in commercial property funds, to protect investors after Britain voted to leave the European Union....
abstract: Stocks fall after four-day rally, as investors fret over British financial system.
